Eugene Y. Q. Shen

Hi! Welcome to my home on the world wide web.

I'm Eugene Y. Q. Shen, a third-year Engineering Physics student at UBC, the University of British Columbia.

(I didn't take enough courses to be promoted, so I'm a third year two years in a row.)

You can also find me on GitHub and LinkedIn.

But you can email me at eugene@eyqs.ca. Come at me, spambots; I'm not scared!

The links on the top of the site will take you magical places.

Index: keeps you here, where I tell you where the links on the top go.
About: takes you to a longer description of me and my life.
Blog: takes you to a blog, where I post a new macroupdate every month.
Cakes: takes you to a picture of some cakes. Read the questions page for why.
Documents: takes you to a collection of schoolwork that I spent too much time on.
Projects: takes you to a listing of all my GitHub projects.
Questions: takes you to a page of frequently (never) asked questions.
Resume: takes you to a very very short resume of me.
Sitemap: takes you to a map of my site, with links to all my webpages.
Tools: takes you to a box of miscellaneous JavaScript tools.
